imdb.plot outline: Office Hours is the newest ICTV (Ithaca College Television) scripted dramedy. It's about a girl named Patty. She's the campus's own Olivia Pope. It seems as though she has everything: the connections, the power, the reputation. But she has a big secret. What happens when the one person she hoped wouldn't find out finally digs up that dirt? Not only is she at risk of losing her underground network, but also her best friend, Steph. With a wacky bunch of characters, and a real beating heart in the story of friendship, Office Hours is new ground on ICTV.
imdb.title: Office Hours
plot: _Office Hours_ (qv) is the newest ICTV (Ithaca College Television) scripted dramedy. It's about a girl named Patty. She's the campus's own Olivia Pope. It seems as though she has everything: the connections, the power, the reputation. But she has a big secret. What happens when the one person she hoped wouldn't find out finally digs up that dirt? Not only is she at risk of losing her underground network, but also her best friend, Steph. With a wacky bunch of characters, and a real beating heart in the story of friendship, _Office Hours_ (qv) is new ground on ICTV.::Yasmeen Mughal
